description: Detects potential PowerShell commands or code within registry run keys
author: frack113
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate admin or third party scripts. Baseline according to your environment
name: Suspicious Powershell In Registry Run Keys
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*powershell* OR /.*[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\ .*/ OR *FromBase64String* OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\(.*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\(.*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww]\ 1\ .*/ OR /.*\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy][Ll][Ee]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee][Nn].*/ OR /.*\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee][Nn].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Ee][Xx][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Ee][Xx]\ \(.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Cc][Mm]\ \-.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Ww][Ee][Bb][Rr][Ee][Qq][Uu][Ee][Ss][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Ww][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]\ .*/))
